full_summary:
=====================================

**Call for Tenders: Evaluation Services Consultant**

The [Department of National Defence](#department_of_national_defence) invites interested parties to submit a tender proposal for the provision of Evaluation Services Consultant services at the intermediate level.

**Tender Details:**

*   **Tender Reference Number:** cb-662-97733741
*   **Modification Number:** 2
*   **Tender Solicitation Number:** W2282-24-AA015
*   **Publication Date:** 2024-05-24
*   **Tender Closing Date:** 2024-06-17T14:00:00
*   **Modification Date:** 2024-06-17
*   **Expected Contract Start Date:** 2024-08-01
*   **Expected Contract End Date:** 2025-08-31

**Scope of Services:**

The successful tenderer will provide Evaluation Services Consultant services to support Director General Military Personnel Research and Analysis in Personnel and Families Research. The scope of work includes providing a technical literature and research review on Canadian Armed Forces resiliency and transition.

**Evaluation Criteria:**

The tender will be evaluated based on a combined rating of technical merit and price, with the highest combined rating being awarded the contract.

**Preferential Trade Agreements:**

This tender is open to bidders who are eligible to participate under the following trade agreements:

*   Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
*   Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
*   Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
*   Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
*   Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
*   Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
*   Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
*   North American Free Trade Agreement (NAFTA)

**Contact Information:**

Olga Zelenskaia
CMPSolicitations-Sollicitations@forces.gc.ca
(613) 901-8743

### References

‡[1]. Department of National Defence (2024). Evaluation Services Consultant at the intermediate level. Government of Canada. Retrieved from [insert link]
